name: Don't Get Sick
description:
You want a burger, but you don't want to get sick. What are you going to do? Throw soap at people!

Use WASD or the arrow keys to shoot up, down, left, or right. Use the mouse to click buttons. Don't let the sick people touch you!

This is my first game, so constructive criticism is appreciated. Made for the Beat the Boredom Game Jam.
